title: Sign In
signUp: Don't have an account? Sign Up

forgot.title: Request password reset
forgot.help: Enter you Email Address and we will send you a reset token with which you can reset your password if needed.

reset.title: Reset password
reset.help: Enter your email, the received key and your new password to complete the reset.

forgotToken.title: Reset key
forgotToken.help: The reset key you received from us.

password.title: Password
password.help: The password must be at least 10 characters long

reset.success: Your password has been successfully changed, you may login with your new password.

length: Password must be at least 10 characters long.
account: Already created an account? Log In.
registered: Registration was successful. You can now login with your new account.
